mapper.body:
{
  "model": "claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
  "max_tokens": 8000,
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "You are a content optimization expert. Please enhance this blog post for dev.to publication:

1. Find an appropriate cover image URL from Unsplash with a ratio of approximately 1000:420 (use format: https://images.unsplash.com/photo-[photo-id] or search-based URL)
2. Add 2-4 relevant tags for dev.to (common tags: javascript, webdev, tutorial, beginners, react, python, etc.)
3. Format for markdown publication

Return your response as a valid JSON object with these exact fields:
- title: string
- description: string
- body_markdown: string
- published: false
- main_image: string (Unsplash URL)
- tags: array of strings
- canonical_url: Original source link

Original post:
Title: {{1.rssFields.title}}
Content: {{9.text}}
Source: {{1.rssFields.link}}"
    }
  ]
}
